testcase.name: Enhanced Error Handler Unit Tests > Message Sending with Retry > should succeed on first attempt

Enhanced Error Handler Unit Tests > Message Sending with Retry > should fail after max retries

failure.message: Test timed out in 15000ms. If this is a long-running test, pass a timeout value as the last argument or configure it globally with "testTimeout".
